== Elements ==

You can use the `background` attribute on the following elements:

  * [BodyElement <body>]
  * [IlayerElement <ilayer>]
  * [LayerElement <layer>]
  * [TableElement <table>]
  * [TdElement <td>]
  * [ThElement <th>]
  * [TrElement <tr>]
